document.heading: Housing Finance Agency Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-239, the “Housing Finance Agency Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-345, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 1, 2002, and November 7, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 26, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-520 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-239 became effective on March 25, 2003.
